description:
Quickly and easily secure yourself at anchors and set up rappels. This adjustable lanyard allows you to anchor yourself where you need to be with a simple pull of the rope. A second, shorter arm can be used with a rappel device or to navigate fixed lines. The lanyard is a short piece of the Edelrid Swift dynamic rope that absorbs energy in case you fall on it while it's unweighted.

  • Dynamic Swift Pro Dry 8.9mm rope is adjustable from 15 to 120cm
  • Fixed side is 45cm
  • Rope clamp is adjustable even under load
  • Includes Kiwi Screwgate carabiner
  • Secures to harness belay loop with girth hitch
name: Edelrid Switch Double Adjust Lanyard
